title: Admin Reference Website URL capture and reminder display

requirements.summary: Add an admin-only page to view/edit and persist a single Reference Website URL plus optional design notes, with robust loading/error states and safe external link handling.
acceptanceCriteria: A new admin-only page is available from the Admin Dashboard (and/or existing admin navigation) labeled in English as “Reference Website”.
The page contains: (1) a required URL field, (2) an optional multi-line notes field, and (3) Save/Cancel actions.
Saving persists the URL/notes in the backend canister and is only allowed for admins; non-admin callers are rejected.
The saved URL is displayed on the page after reload and includes a safe “Open link” action that opens in a new tab.
The page shows clear loading and error states and does not crash on backend failures.

file_operations.description: Create React Query hook(s) to fetch the saved Reference Website (using getReferenceWebsite) and to save updates (using setReferenceWebsite), leveraging the existing actor from useActor; ensure errors are surfaced to the caller for UI display. Use existing auth/admin flow (authorization component already in the app). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Implement the admin-only “Reference Website” page UI: required URL input, optional multi-line notes textarea, Save/Cancel actions, and a read-only section showing the currently saved URL/notes with a safe “Open link” action (new tab, noopener/noreferrer). Include loading and error states (e.g., using existing LoadingState/ErrorState patterns) and handle backend failures without crashing. Use existing shadcn-ui components for form/layout where appropriate. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire the new admin page into routing (e.g., add an /admin/reference-website route) and wrap it with the existing AdminRouteGuard so only admins can access it. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a new Admin Dashboard navigation card labeled “Reference Website” that links to the new admin page. Keep all new text in English. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Show the saved Reference Website URL read-only in the existing admin area (admin-only) with an Open link action and a not-set placeholder.
acceptanceCriteria: When an admin has saved a Reference Website URL, the admin area shows the URL in a read-only display and provides an “Open link” action.
If no Reference Website URL has been saved yet, the admin area shows a short English placeholder message indicating that the reference link has not been set.
This display is not visible to non-admin users.

file_operations.description: Add a small read-only reminder section/card on the Admin Dashboard that uses the Reference Website fetch hook to display either: (a) the saved URL with a safe “Open link” action (new tab, noopener/noreferrer), or (b) an English placeholder indicating the reference link has not been set. Ensure loading and error states are shown clearly. Since this is within an admin-guarded page, it remains hidden from non-admin users. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
